p: To date, some countries where measles has been declared eliminated have confirmed new cases in recent years, such as, South Korea with 107 new cases, of which 04 imported in 2013 [ 6]. The WHO European Region which was already close to eliminating measles confirmed a total of 21,315 cases between 2016 and 2017 with 35 deaths [ 7]. Measles remains a global public health problem hence the need to strengthen immunization, surveillance and health monitoring.
